question: Who has been chosen as the fourth President of Nanyang Technological University?
explanation: Professor Subra Suresh, a distinguished alumnus of Indian Institute of Technology Madras and a native of Chennai, has been chosen as the fourth President of Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore. NTU Singapore is one of the world's leading universities it has also been placed the world's top young university for the last four consecutive years.
